sentences.sentence: We cannot change anything until we accept it.
sentences.translation: 我们无法改变任何事，直到我们接受它的存在。

sentences.sentence: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
sentences.translation: 哪怕希望快要破灭，也要努力挣扎，坚持下去。

sentences.sentence: In this life time, you don't have to prove nothing to nobody except yourself.
sentences.translation: 一生中，你不必向任何人证明什么，除了你自己。
